text.name: myi_CropMultiplier_long
text.text: Select your multiplier number, higher number gets more yield, choose `1` if you want the default base game multiplier.

text.name: myi_WindrowMultiplier_long
text.text: Select your multiplier number, higher number gets more windrow, choose `1` if you want the default base game multiplier.

text.name: myi_crop_blink_warn
text.text: Warning: The crop harvesting yield multiplier has been updated.

text.name: myi_windrow_blink_warn
text.text: Warning: The windrow harvesting yield multiplier has been updated.
